effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 6.0 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 16,289 Agility for 15 sec.

Use: Feed the Coagulum, redirecting 20% of all healing done until 1.3 million healing has been consumed. Once sated, the Coagulum bursts to heal 5 allies for 931,674.

Lingering effluvia causes affected allies' next attacks to deal an additional 23,499 Shadow damage, increased based on overhealing done by the Coagulum. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
